To preview the app, you can use Expo Go on a physical device or an emulator.

1.  **Expo Go:** Download the Expo Go app on your iOS or Android device. Then, run `npx expo start` in your project directory. This will start the Expo development server and generate a QR code. Scan the QR code with the Expo Go app to open the app on your device.
2.  **Emulator:** If you have an Android emulator or iOS simulator set up, you can press "a" to run it on Android or "i" to run it on iOS after running `npx expo start`.
